job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-16T01:57:27.000Z", "description": "

Software Engineer

tl;dr: An innovative seed-stage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Software Engineer (fullstack) to join our team and help design and build a greenfield cybersecurity product using bleeding edge technology.
Our tech-stack and R&D culture

As this is a greenfield application, we do not have all the details ironed out, you will help us do that. However, we do know we will be using:

\u25cf     Node.js backend

\u25cf     React / Vue / Angular frontend

\u25cf     TypeScript on both

\u25cf     Serverless, kubernetes, AWS

\u25cf     Neo4j, MongoDB

We will be putting a high emphasis on:

\u25cf     Honing your skills

\u25cf     SOLID design principles

\u25cf     Highly maintainable and testable code

\u25cf     Non-blocking automatic CI/CD pipeline

\u25cf     Letting developers develop and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings, procedures and rules

\u25cf     Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product

\u25cf     Open-source use and contribute

What do we expect you to bring to the table?

We believe that for every highly functioning relationship, there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a win-win situation for all.

Our key requirements are:

\u25cf     Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it

\u25cf     Assume best intentions \u2013 we know we will!

\u25cf     Drive to build something amazing

\u25cf     Be excited about data and coding

\u25cf     Have strong opinions, but hold them loosely

 

What will you be doing?

As a seed-stage team member, you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models. You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process, working directly with the other team members and leadership (we have a very flat structure). In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the company.
